title: What do you guys think about the new graves ult?
body: To be honest I don't really like it, I cringed at first because this is what I see it as. Graves shoots a bullet then bounces off thin air and then returns to graves through the ground leaving a trail of fire. I don't really understand what is going on please tell me what is happening with the ult annimation and don't get mad at me. Other than that I would still buy graves because you get the feeling you are actually using a shotgun with the new passive.

replies.body: Ummm, that's his Q, not his ult.
No matter it still looks pretty dumb
